channel.title: Hello, I'm Andy Croll
channel.description:
Hi
I'm Andy, living in Brighton UK, having spent a number of years in Singapore. I'm mostly (day job) a consulting designer and Rails developer.
I've got an entrepreneurial bent, having been CTO in a VC-funded (gasp) startup, so I've been through that. I've run conferences, RedDotRubyConf (and launching a UK-based Ruby conference in a week or two) and wrote a book on HTML Email for Five Simple Steps.
I'm [@andycroll][1] on twitter, if you want that in your life :smile:
[1]: http://twitter.com/andycroll

item.title: Hello, I'm Andy Croll
item.dc:creator: andycroll
item.description:
Cannot wait to get the printed version in my hands… very exciting.

item.description:
RedDotRubyConf by andy was one of the best organized Ruby conferences i’ve attended. So definitely attend his uk-based one.
